article_node.title: Trump Threatens to Send National Guard to Chicago
article_node.summary: Trump’s ‘Balance of Power’ broadcast highlighted his threat to deploy National Guard troops to cities like Chicago, his praise for trade deals with South Korea, and his continued pressure on China with potential 200% tariffs. He also discussed federal involvement in tech, citing Intel and Nvidia, while critics warned of government overreach. The segment touched on domestic policy, including gun violence funding and the political climate ahead of the 2026 election.
